summary: A unit test suite that verifies the correctness of the ALB Listener HTTPS compliance check across multiple Terraform configurations, covering both compliant and nonâ€‘compliant scenarios such as protocol mismatches, redirects, and unsupported transport types.
business_intent: To guarantee that AWS Application Load Balancer listeners defined in IaC adhere to security best practices by enforcing HTTPS usage and proper protocol handling, thereby supporting automated compliance enforcement.
